meanings.definition: An amount of money or units totaling several billion in number.
meanings.sent1: The company made multibillions from their latest product launch.
meanings.sent2: The government spent multibillions on infrastructure development.
meanings.sent3: It would take multibillions of coins to fill up a swimming pool.
meanings.sent4: Her savings goal seemed like trying to count multibillions of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the pandemic cost the economy multibillions in lost revenue.

meanings.definition: A quantity or number exceeding several billion.
meanings.sent1: The population of the city reached multibillions during the festival.
meanings.sent2: The global demand for smartphones is in the multibillions annually.
meanings.sent3: Trying to organize a multibillions of Lego pieces can be a daunting task.
meanings.sent4: The forest was home to multibillions of leaves rustling in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sheer size of the universe is beyond comprehension, with stars numbering in the multibillions.
